The light-brown liquid of a _sure-step potion_ helps you find your footing. After drinking it, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369) for 1 hour. In addition, you can [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=2304) into [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=2366), and you aren’t [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) on uneven ground.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
